I don’t really get it.\""},{"lineNumber":248287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仲間、家族、友人……それに、敵……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Companions, family, friends… and even enemies..."},{"lineNumber":248288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでもいいのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"anything is fine.\""},{"lineNumber":248289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰にも見て貰えないのが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What’s the saddest is..."},{"lineNumber":248290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一番悲しいから」","translatedEnglishLine":"not being seen by anyone.\""},{"lineNumber":248291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"……\""},{"lineNumber":248292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":248293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐが〜……ぐが〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guga~... Seal chick was sleeping the whole time...\""},{"lineNumber":248316,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはしかめ面で肩に担いだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Frowning, Rance looked at the person slung over his shoulder,"},{"lineNumber":248317,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の奴隷を見た。","translatedEnglishLine":"his slave."},{"lineNumber":248318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅ〜ん、むにゃむにゃ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuun, munya munya...\""},{"lineNumber":248319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えへへ、ランス様ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heheh, Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":248320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「捨ててったろか、この馬鹿者……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Should I just throw you away, you idiot...\""},{"lineNumber":248321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女の子を米袋みたいに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop carrying a girl around like a sack of rice...\""},{"lineNumber":248322,"originalJapaneseLine":"　抱えるのやめなさいよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Quit holding her like that...\""},{"lineNumber":248323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, by the way."},{"lineNumber":248324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ、シィルから」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is from Seal.\""},{"lineNumber":248325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにこれ……手紙？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's this... a letter?\""},{"lineNumber":248326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":248327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら途中で寝てしまうかも知れんから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She said I might fall asleep halfway through,"},{"lineNumber":248328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのときは渡して欲しいと頼まれたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"so she asked me to give this to you then."},{"lineNumber":248329,"originalJapaneseLine":"　挨拶だけはちゃんとしたいからとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"She said she wanted to at least properly greet you...\""},{"lineNumber":248330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「律儀で……良い子ね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So conscientious... such a good girl..."},{"lineNumber":248331,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人なんかに義理通す必要ないのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"She doesn't need to be loyal to a demon like you.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仲間になって欲しいと言ったのは嘘だったの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was it a lie when you said you wanted me to join your group?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前戦争とか興味なさそうだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you don’t seem interested in war at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスと敵対することになるが平気か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’ll end up opposing Cavebris, are you okay with that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスはね、ランスと同じ、
私に近づいても平気な奴なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is someone who can approach me without fear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦わなきゃ殺されるから従ったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I obeyed because I would have been killed if I didn’t fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの男が私を敵として見てくれるなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if that man sees me as an enemy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「『関係』が作れるなら、それでもいいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we can build some kind of ‘relationship,’ that’s fine with me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく遊びに来てくれたのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You came all this way to visit,
and now I’m lonely~ so lonely~..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、よく頑張った方なんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you did pretty well, didn’t you?"
"Well, I’ll just leave you like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適当な時間になったら起こしましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll wake you up at some appropriate time."
"Heheh, hearing someone else's voice inside the house,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分以外の誰かの声がするって、いいね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it feels nice that it’s not just me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、ランスが目覚めたのは
日が暮れようとしている頃だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: around the time the sun was setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわぁ〜、お前のそばにいると、
どうしても寝てしまうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I inevitably end up falling asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う〜む、俺様は最強なのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, even though I’m the strongest..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「多少起きていられるだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just being able to stay awake even a little is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充分すごいんだけどね……」
シィルの奴、ずっと寝ていたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that Seal chick was sleeping the whole time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはしかめ面で肩に担いだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Frowning, Rance looked at the person slung over his shoulder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「捨ててったろか、この馬鹿者……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Should I just throw you away, you idiot..."
"Stop carrying a girl around like a sack of rice..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱えるのやめなさいよ……」
「もしかしたら途中で寝てしまうかも知れんから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She said I might fall asleep halfway through,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのときは渡して欲しいと頼まれたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she asked me to give this to you then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 挨拶だけはちゃんとしたいからとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She said she wanted to at least properly greet you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人なんかに義理通す必要ないのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She doesn't need to be loyal to a demon like you."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
